document_data.name: Krailash
document_data.deathnotes: Killed closing a portal to the [[Far Realm]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Krailash''', sometimes known as '''Krai''' was a [[dragonborn]] [[fighter]] who served as guard captain and chief of security for the Travelers of the merchant [[House Serrat]].
document_data.Description: Krailash was huge, standing nearly seven feet (2 meters) tall and weighing 300 lbs. (136 kg.).{{Cite digital book/Venom in Her Veins/Kindle|233}}  He had rust colored scales.
